title: The Proposition 5: The Ferro Family
description: The final book in the NEW YORK TIMES bestselling series by H.M. WardBlackmail. Sex. Ferro. Time is my enemy and I won’t waste another second. I have a choice to make: a life with Neil or what’s left of life with Bryan. I make my decision, but could lose everything when the one Ferro I never want to see interferes. I feel like my life is spiraling out of control, but this could lead to what I’ve been searching for all along—hope.
author: H.M. Ward
